## Participating in Research {.appendix}

Choosing to participate in a study is an important personal decision. Talk with your doctor and family members or friends about deciding to join a study. To learn more about this study, you or your doctor may contact the study research staff using the contacts provided below. For general information, <a href="https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/about-studies/learn">Learn About Clinical Studies.</a> (Source: clinicaltrials.gov)
